name: I'm The Brut Now
description: Win a game on Overkill while taking the most damage on your team.

name: Ban This Guy
description: Fire at least 1 shot with MG.

name: Mccool's Pineapple's
description: Get 3 kills with GL in a single game.

name: Plasma Pontiff
description: Get 3 kills with PG in a single game.

name: Honorary Zoomer
description: Finish a game with over 50% LG accuracy.

name: Bad Baiter
description: Lose a game with RG as your most damaging weapon.

name: Good Baiter
description: Win a game with RG as your most damaging weapon.

name: A Win is a Win
description: Win a game with 0 frags.

name: KGB's Dream
description: Finish a game with over 75% RG accuracy.

name: net_restart
description: Finish a game with less than 10% SG accuracy

name: Bad Luck Brut
description: Finish a game with 0% RG accuracy (with 5 or more shots).

name: 9th Point Curse
description: Lose a game 9-10.

name: Mccool's Dream
description: Win a game at 10-9.

name: Torrin's Handcam
description: Finish a game with less than 30% LG accuracy.

name: Skinner's List
description: Finish a game with greater than 85% RL accuracy.

name: Solo's Database
description: Finish a game with over 50% LG and 75% RG accuracy.

name: Gribbled's Disciple
description: Finish a game without using LG.

name: Back to Fortnite
description: Lose a game 10-0.

name: A Glimmer of Hope
description: Lose a game 1-10.

name: Spit on Him Father
description: Win a game 10-0.
